channel.title: ASF JIRA

item.title: [HBASE-17190] eclipse compile master error

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.

comments.comment:
What command do you use to compile HBase?

Have you trid 'mvn clean install -DskipTests'?
eclise with maven 3.3.9, and goals is: clean install -DskipTests. hbase-1.2.3 is ok.
OK. Let me have a try for windows...

Thanks!

Windows 7中文专业版

jdk1.8.0_111/jre1.8.0_111

Eclipse Platform
Version: Neon.1 (4.6.1)
Build id: M20160907-1200

Apache Maven 3.3.9 (bb52d8502b132ec0a5a3f4c09453c07478323dc5; 2015-11-11T00:41:47+08:00)
